name: Smartwool PhD Outdoor Light Pattern Crew Socks - Women's
categories: PhD Outdoor Light Pattern Crew Socks
description: Socks to inspire your next adventure. These minimalist socks keep your feet happy while you're out on the trails.Made of soft merino wool, nylon, and elastane.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for durability and comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for an irritation-free wear.Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet.
